betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Supremium Ingot is an ingot that can §eonly be obtained by doing the following§r:

- Use an §6Iron Ingot§r and §6Prosperity Shard§rs (§7Which are only found in space§r) to make the §6Base Essence Ingot§r.

- Combine the Base Essence Ingot with two §6Inferium Essence§rs (§7Obtainable by killing mobs or mining it's ore§r) to make the §6Inferium Ingot§r.

- Combine the Inferium Ingot with two §6Prudentium Essence§rs (§7Craftable using four Inferium Essences alongside an §6Infusion Crystal§r) to make the §6Prudentium Ingot§r.

- Combine the Prudentium Ingot and two §6Intermedium Essence§rs (§7Craftable using four Prudentium Essences alongside an Infusion Crystal§r) to make the §6Intermedium Ingot§r.

- Combine the Intermedium Ingot with two §6Superium Essence§rs (§7Craftable using four Intermedium Essences alongside an Infusion Crystal§r) to make the §6Superium Ingot§r.

- Combine the Superium Ingot with two §6Supremium Essence§rs (§7Craftable using four Superium Essences alongside an Infusion Crystal§r) to make the §6Supremium Ingot§r.

Basically just a long line of Obtaining Inferium Essences to make other types of Essences.
